Package com.phasmidsoftware.dsaipg.graphs.undirected

Interface Graph<Vertex,Adjacent>

Type Parameters:
Vertex - the type of a vertex.
All Known Subinterfaces:
EdgeGraph<V,E>, Geo<V,E>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractGraph, BaseGeoGraph, DAG_Impl, DiGraph, GeoGraphSpherical, Graph_Edges, Graph_Simple
public interface Graph<Vertex,Adjacent>
Graph interface for undirected graphs.
